# Python 3.9.7

$MANAGER=pip
install --no-warn-script-location	numpy==1.21.3
install --no-warn-script-location	fsspec==2021.10.1
install --no-warn-script-location	matplotlib==3.4.3
install --no-warn-script-location	scipy==1.7.1
install --no-warn-script-location	snakemake==6.10.0
install --no-warn-script-location	pandas==1.3.4
install --no-warn-script-location	more-itertools==8.10.0
install --no-warn-script-location	concurrent-utils==0.2.0
install --no-warn-script-location	biopython==1.79
install --no-warn-script-location	lxml==4.6.3
install --no-warn-script-location	scikit-learn==1.0.1
